name: DC1-SPINE1
description: Verifies TACACS source-interface for a specified VRF.
messages: Source-interface Management0 is not configured in VRF default

name: DC1-SPINE1
description: Verifies that the provided LLDP neighbors are connected properly.
messages:
Wrong LLDP neighbor(s) on port(s):
   Ethernet1
      DC1-LEAF1A_Ethernet1
   Ethernet2
      DC1-LEAF1B_Ethernet1
Port(s) not configured:
   Ethernet7

name: DC1-SPINE1
description: Verifies the count of BGP peers.
messages: Failures: [{'afi': 'ipv4', 'safi': 'unicast', 'vrfs': {'PROD': 'Not Configured', 'default': 'Expected: 3, Actual: 4'}}, {'afi': 'ipv4', 'safi': 'multicast', 'vrfs': {'DEV': 'Not Configured'}}, {'afi': 'evpn', 'vrfs': {'default': 'Expected: 2, Actual: 4'}}]

name: DC1-SPINE1
description: Verifies the configured STP mode for a provided list of VLAN(s).
messages: STP mode 'rapidPvst' not configured for the following VLAN(s): [10, 20]

name: DC1-SPINE1
description: Verifies if the SNMP agent is enabled.
messages: SNMP agent disabled in vrf default

name: DC1-SPINE1
description: Verifies that the provided routes are present in the routing table of a specified VRF.
messages: The following route(s) are missing from the routing table of VRF default: ['10.1.0.2']

name: DC1-SPINE1
description: Verifies that the utilization of interfaces is below a certain threshold.

name: DC1-SPINE1
description: Verifies the health status of the MLAG configuration.
messages: MLAG is disabled

name: DC1-SPINE1
description: Verifies the Vxlan1 interface status.
messages: Vxlan1 interface is not configured

name: DC1-SPINE1
description: Verifies the IPv4 BFD peer's sessions and remote disc in the specified VRF.
messages:
Following BFD peers are not configured, status is not up or remote disc is zero:
{'192.0.255.8': {'default': 'Not Configured'}, '192.0.255.7': {'default': 'Not Configured'}}

name: DC1-SPINE1
description: Verifies if NTP is synchronised.
messages: The device is not synchronized with the configured NTP server(s): 'NTP is disabled.'

name: DC1-SPINE1
description: Test the network reachability to one or many destination IP(s).
messages: ping vrf MGMT 1.1.1.1 source Management1 repeat 2 has failed: No source interface Management1

name: DC1-SPINE1
description: Verifies if Telnet is disabled in the default VRF.

description: Verifies the EOS version of the device.
messages: device is running version "4.31.1F-34554157.4311F (engineering build)" not in expected versions: ['4.25.4M', '4.26.1F']

name: DC1-SPINE1
description: Verifies the hostname of a device.
messages: Expected `s1-spine1` as the hostname, but found `DC1-SPINE1` instead.
